member.name: T:InventoryRESTApi.Controllers.InventoryController
member.summary: Inventory Controller Class that allows to API calls.

members.member:
Retrieve either a list of all Inventory or Inventory with a particular name when the name is provided in the query string
InventoryItem name List of Inventory Ok Bad Request Not Found GET: api/Inventory GET: api/Inventory?name={name}
Gets the InventoryItem by identifier. The identifier. The InventoryItem. Ok Bad Request Not Found GET: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91
Updates the InventoryItem. The identifier. The InventoryItem to be updated. Status code Ok Bad Request Not Found PUT: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91
DELETE: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91 Deletes the InventoryItem. The identifier. Status code Ok Bad Request Not Found
GET: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91/options Gets the InventoryItem options. The identifier. InventoryItem options Ok Bad Request Not Found

GET: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91/options/ff3bfa42-ea12-46a3-9bae-9c13ae550610 Gets the InventoryItem option by InventoryItem and option identifiers. The InventoryItem identifier. The option identifier. InventoryItem option. Ok Bad Request Not Found

PUT: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91/options/ff3bfa42-ea12-46a3-9bae-9c13ae550610 Updates the InventoryItem option. The InventoryItem identifier. The option identifier. The InventoryItem option. Status code Ok Bad Request Not Found

POST: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91/options Creates the InventoryItem option. The InventoryItem identifier. The InventoryItem option. Created InventoryItem option Ok Bad Request Not Found

DELETE: api/Inventory/07f98a2c-72b6-40af-b50d-d3cc1bc96f91/options/ff3bfa42-ea12-46a3-9bae-9c13ae550610 Deletes the InventoryItem option. The identifier. The option identifier. Status code Ok Bad Request Not Found
